metadata.title: CVE-2023-31208 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper neutralization of livestatus command delimiters in the RestAPI inCheckmk < 2.0.0p36, < 2.1.0p28, and < 2.2.0b8 (beta) allows arbitrarylivestatus command execution for authorized users.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
